game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: Find and retrieve the ancient artifact.
game.description: In a forgotten temple deep in the jungle, an elusive artifact is said to be hidden. Uncover its location and bring it back to the quest giver.
game.reward: 1000 gold coins and a legendary weapon blueprint

task.objective: Locate the entrance to the temple
task.description: You must find the hidden entrance among the dense vegetation. Speak with local villagers for clues.
The artifact is guarded by puzzles written in an ancient script. Translate the text to proceed.
